channel.title: Publications | JooYoung Seo: Learning Scientist for Inclusive Learning Ecologies

item.title: Coding Through Touch: Exploring and Re-Designing Tactile Making Activities with Learners with Visual Dis/abilities
Discovering Informal Learning Cultures of Blind Individuals Pursuing STEM Disciplines: A Quantitative Ethnography Using Listserv Archives
item.description: This work has been presented in the First International Confrence on Quantitative Ethnography, and awarded The Cengage Fellowship.

item.title: Is the Maker Movement Inclusive of ANYONE?: Three Accessibility Considerations to Invite Blind Makers to the Making World
Analysis of Caregiver Burden in Palliative Care: An Integrated Review
LaTeX is NOT Easy: Creating Accessible Scientific Documents With R Markdown
item.description: This work has been presented in the 34th CSUN Assistive Technology Conference in Anaheim, CA, U.S (Wednesday, March 13, 2019 - 1:20 PM PST).

item.title: Effects of Nonpharmacological Interventions for Fatigue in Patients with Heart Failure: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
Furthering Inclusivity in Making: A Framework for Accessible Design of Makerspaces for Learners with Disabilities
item.description: This poster has been presented in the 2018 American Educational Research Association in New York City, NY.

item.title: Accessibility, Making and Tactile Robotics: Facilitating Collaborative Learning and Computational Thinking for Learners with Visual Impairments
The Role of ICT in Aiding Visually Impaired Students and Professionals
item.description: This work has been presented in Proceedings of the 11th Multidisciplinary Academic Conference in Prague 2017, Czech Republic.

item.title: Embracing Learners with Visual Impairments in CSCL
item.description: This work has been presented in the 2017 International Conference on Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning in Philadelphia, US.

item.title: Using Hierarchical Linear Modeling to Measure Growth Rate in a Gamified CBM Environment
item.description: This work has been presented in the 2016 Northeastern Educational Research Association Conference.
